characters.name: Maomao
characters.description:
Maomao works as an apothecary in the red light district, helping her mentor and father Luomen in caring for its residents, with special attention given to the Verdigris Hall brothel, where she was born and was initially raised.

One day, while gathering herbs, she gets kidnapped and sold to be a common servant in the inner court of the imperial palace, where only the Emperor's consorts and their servants reside. Not allowed to leave, her curious personality and skills begin to rope her into mysterious problems that can affect the whole country.
~! It was later revealed that Loumen was actually her adoptive father. Her biological father is Lakan, the tactician in the Li military. Loumen is actually Maomao's biological great-uncle. Her biological mother is Fengxian, who was a high ranking courtesan at the Verdigris House. !~

characters.name: Jinshi
characters.description: Jinshi is the eunuch in charge of the affairs of the inner palace. He is described as having a face capable even of outshining the consorts in beauty, amazing women and men alike. He is constantly accompanied by his attendant Gaoshun and has taken an interest to Maomao's intelligence and active demeanor.

characters.name: Koutei
characters.description: The current Emperor fulfills the role expected of him. He is hated by his mother, the Empress dowager, for being the product of her rape. His most trustworthy relationship is with his brother, who manages small things behind the scenes for him.

characters.name: Riishu
characters.description: The Virtuous consort, residing in the Diamond Palace within the inner court. She was sent to be a high consort on the inner court as a young child because her prominent family was aware of the previous Emperor's pedophilic tendencies. When he died, she was allowed to leave as she was never visited by him, but her family arranged for her to return to her high consort position. Due to how young she is, she doesn't get any interest from the current Emperor, commands no respect, nor does she have any influence. She's very naive and gets bullied even by her own attendants.

characters.name: Aaduo
characters.description:
The Pure consort, residing in the Garner Palace within the inner court. She was the current Emperor's milk sibling and childhood crush, being just a year older than him. She became the previous Emperor's consort and gave birth to his child at 18, who was stillborn. The ordeal made her infertile, but circumstances between her and the royal family allowed her to keep her position as a High Consort.

She is very spartan on the outside yet has a motherly side to her.

~!She is Jinshi's real mother!~

characters.name: Rifa
characters.description: The Able consort, residing in the Crystal Palace within the inner court. The second most favoured consort of the Emperor, said to be so in big part due to her voluptuous chest. She gave birth to a boy who succumbed for unknown reasons and she herself is in grave health condition at the start of the story.

characters.name: Gyokuyou
characters.description:
The Noble consort, residing in the Jade Palace within the inner court. Her red hair and green eyes distinguish her from the other consorts, that being part of the reasons she became the Emperor's favoured consort, having already given birth to a girl of his. Despite these circumstances, she is very careful of whom she keeps around so she has the smallest retinue of all the high consorts.

~! Later on, she gives birth to a boy, the new heir to the crown, thus becoming the Empress. !~

characters.name: Gaoshun
characters.description: Gaoshun is Jinshi's attendant. He's shown to be extremely dependable. A stern believer in deference to authority and proper etiquette, his disapproval is often splattered in his transparent facial expressions, even if he says nothing.

characters.name: Lakan
characters.description:
Lakan is a renowned strategist known for his nonchalant disregard of proper manners. His plotting ability causes fear even in the Emperor himself. He sees people's faces as a piece of shogi representing their worth, with a few exceptions like the woman he loved and his daughter. Currently heads the La clan.

~!He is Maomao's biological father and the nephew of Luomen!~

characters.name: Ruomen
characters.description: Ruomen is a physician of the Inner Court, a physician in the red-light district, and Maomao's father.

characters.name: Meimei
characters.description: Meimei is one of the Three Princesses of Verdigris Hall. She started as Fenshen's apprentice and, being somewhat cunning herself, inherited Fenshen's taste for strategy board games. She is the most attached to the brothel and the people within.

characters.name: Pairin
characters.description: Pairin is the oldest of the Three Princesses of Verdigris Hall. She loves men's bodies and dreams of being taken away by a muscular prince.

characters.name: Joka
characters.description: Joka is the youngest of the Three Princesses of Verdigris Hall and one of Maomao's adopted sisters.

characters.name: Fuyou
characters.description: A mid-rank consort, princess of a distant land. She became the Emperor's middle consort against her will.
